ranked_diseases.explanation: The patient's features (Intellectual disability, Delayed speech and language development) closely match the phenotypic features of Case 1, which was diagnosed with this disorder.
The patient shares some features with Case 2 (Intellectual disability, Delayed speech and language development, Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder), though not all features are present.

The patient has some overlapping features with Case 3 (Intellectual disability, Delayed speech and language development, Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder), but lacks several other key features such as Autism and Seizure.
